text:
InfluxData | Software / Support Engineer, and almost every other position | SF | ONSITE/REMOTE | Full Time

InfluxData makes the time series database InfluxDB, and related products. Our customers love us, we're growing fast, looking for curious humans to help us grow. Very remote-friendly (I'm remote).

Golang, Javascript, Kubernetes, AWS

- Developer Advocate - DevRel - Managers, Directors - Account Exec - Product Manager - SDR - SE - SWE - Golang, JS/React - Support Engineer - Tech Writer

https://www.influxdata.com/careers/ or email me jacobmarble@influxdata.com
